Queue Operations.queue_enqueue_priority_item: Enqueue a high priority item (add to end of priority queue)
Queue Operations.queue_enqueue_from_list: Enqueue items from a list into queue (add list to end)
Queue Operations.queue_enqueue_priority_from_list: Enqueue priority items from a list (add list to end of priority queue)
Queue Operations.queue_dequeue_return_an_item: Dequeue an item (remove from front, return item)
Queue Operations.queue_dequeue_delete_an_item: Dequeue an item (remove from front, don't return)
Queue Operations.queue_peek_at_next_item: Look/peek at next available element (from front)
Queue Operations.queue_get_size: Get size (number of items) in the queue
Queue Operations.queue_export_to_list: Export a list of all queue items

Stack Operations.stack_pop_return_item: Pop an item (remove from top, return item)
Stack Operations.stack_pop_delete_item: Pop an item (remove from top, don't return)
Stack Operations.stack_get_size: Get size (number of items) on the stack
Stack Operations.stack_export_to_list: Export a list of all stack items

Iterating.iterate_pointer_data_type: Data type of a iterator pointer
Iterating.iterate_move_to_beginning: Move pointer to beginning of queue/stack
Iterating.iterate_move_to_end: Move pointer to end of queue/stack
